resources.string: This Jewel Tree Meditation is adapted from Robert Thurman\'s book \"The Jewel Tree of Tibet: The Enlightenment Engine of Tibetan Buddhism,\" Free Press, 2005.

Renee McKenna, MA, is a clinical hypnotherapist with a private Spiritual Psychology practice in San Francisco. Renee leads workshops and retreats in the Bay Area and offers individual sessions in person and remotely, via the phone, Facetime and Skype.
